conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway. All 3D criteria met with clear wall geometry and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have consistent height and thickness; projection is clean and maintains structural logic.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout. Stairs, pantry island, and room proportions are perfectly aligned with the 2D dimensions.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is excellent, including kitchen appliances and bathroom fixtures. Toy blocks in playroom show high attention to detail.

visual_clarity.notes: Rendering is clean with consistent lighting. Deducted 1 point for slight door orientation inconsistency on the foyer bifold.

detected_errors.description: Foyer closet bifold doors rendered as multiple swinging panels; layout still functional.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically precise 3D conversion that captures every architectural nuance of the 2D original.
